attributes.action: If the Prime Minister wishes to retain any honour for his party, he will make his MPs pay back the expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The party that does that will win the next election; because they will then understand what it's like to be overdrawn, short of money and struggling, like most of the population. 
So says I!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
